donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: The project will strengthen the institutional and legal framework for fostering inclusive growth centered on the rural economy and enhancing territorial development for human development. It will help to increase economic opportunities for micro, small and medium enterprises in rural and peri-urban areas through inclusive market strategies, availability of financial services, and inclusive and innovative microfinance products.  It builds on its experience in local development and its collaboration between UNDP and the UN Capital Development Fund (UNCDF).

This project is part of the Local Economic Development Project that also includes the Inclusive Finance and Markets component.  It will focus on the reduction of rural poverty through promotion of local economic development, with emphasis on fostering and supporting the creation and development of micro, small and medium enterprises (MSMEs) at the local level.  Through this focus, the aim of all interventions will be to create and increase access to decent work that leads to improved incomes and livelihoods targeting youth and women, thus contributing as strategically as possible to the reduction of poverty.

project_descr: This project will focus on the reduction of rural poverty through promotion of local economic development, with emphasis on fostering and supporting the creation and development of micro, small and medium enterprises (MSMEs) at the local level.
project_title: Local Economic Development for Increased Incomes
